attributes.action: Support theatre workers and freelance musicians through this temporary crisis
attributes.additional_details: We cannot work from home as other sectors can, yet we generate about £7 billion for the economy when functioning
attributes.background:
RETAIN NOT RETRAIN 
Offer support to workers whose jobs have been put on hold by the government’s coronavirus policies

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Offer more support to the arts (particularly Theatres and Music) amidst COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320711

Support the four pillar plan for recovery in the performing arts & entertainment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332353

Extend furlough scheme for theatre and live music industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329174
